protocol_name: T Cell Activation with anti-CD3 Antibodies Protocol - Human
protocol_name_html: T Cell Activation with anti-CD3 Antibodies Protocol - Human
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"a6mst","text":"• Sterile PBS ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c926t","text":"• Anti-human CD3 Antibody ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b57qb","text":"       - Clone UCHT1 (LEAF™ format, Cat. No. 300413/300414/300432; Ultra-LEAF™ format, Cat. No. 300437/300438)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cs0tk","text":"       - Clone OKT3 (LEAF™ format, Cat. No. 317303/317304/317315; Ultra-LEAF™ format, Cat. No. 317325/317326)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h7qe","text":"       - Clone HIT3a (LEAF™ format, Cat. No. 300313/300314; Ultra-LEAF™ format, Cat. No. 300331/300332) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6a09o","text":"• Cell culture medium (e.g., RPMI-1640 or IMDM supplemented with 10% FBS and 2mM L-glutamine) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d91o8","text":"• Sterile single-cell suspension of Ficoll-Hypaque-purified peripheral blood mononuclear cells, isolated T cells, or T cell subsets ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c15g1","text":"• 96-well flat-bottom tissue culture plates with lids (e.g., Costar® Cat. No. 3596)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fakdf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9neqk","text":"* Soluble forms of LEAF™ purified UCHT1 (1 µg/ml) or LEAF™ purified HIT3a (0.01 – 0.1 µg/ml) may be","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rpn5","text":"used to activate T cells from PBMC cell populations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"ehbl","text":"Prepare a 10 \u00b5g\/ml solution of anti-CD3 (clone UCHT1, OKT3, or HIT3a) in sterile PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"0545B34F0024405BA5B0DD60A3FFB6F7","id":664105,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"trs4","text":"Dispense 50 \u00b5l of the antibody solution to each microwell of the 96-well assay plate. For the unstimulated control wells, add 50 \u00b5l of sterile PBS.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9cnv5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":3183,"guid":"","linfor":null,"mol_weight":0,"name":"96-well flat-bottom tissue culture plates with lids","_public":"","reagent_vendor_link":"https:\/\/www.corning.com\/worldwide\/en.html","sku":"3596","url":"https:\/\/www.fishersci.com\/shop\/products\/costar-cell-culture-plates-17\/p-154710","vendor":{"name":"Corning","affiliation":null,"username":null,"link":"https:\/\/www.corning.com\/worldwide\/en.html","image":{"source":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io\/img\/vendors\/placeholder.png","placeholder":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io\/img\/vendors\/placeholder.png"},"badges":[],"id":40},"public":0,"can_edit":0}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9v20f","text":"Seal plate. Incubate at 37\u00b0C for 2 hours or 4\u00b0C overnight. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fs1bg","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19340","duration":"7200","label":"","guid":"3C09CA76D9214A2AA98573605A83365A"}}]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8ajm1","text":"Aseptically decant antibody solution from the microwell plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1953","text":"Wash plate microwells 3 times with sterile PBS. Discard liquid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"C8BEE88675B84710AFE675A2AAA5D805","id":664109,"previous_id":664108,"previous_guid":"CC5DA821BFDF4027BE92F95A04EC3C6A","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ep8vu","text":"Prepare single cell suspension of cells of interest in supplemented cell culture medium to 1-2 x 106\/ml.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":99,"length":2,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ecad2","text":"Aliquot 200 \u00b5l cell suspension into plate microwells. Cover with lid. Incubate at 37\u00b0C in 5% CO2 and 100% humidity for 3 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":95,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
